timeline.title: Festival of Lanterns
timeline.description: Annual celebration in the town square. Lanterns are lit at dusk and floated down the river to honor ancestors.

timeline.title: Full Moon Gathering
timeline.description: The druids meet at the ancient stone circle

adventureLog.title: The Shadow in the Depths
adventureLog.summary: Following the clues from the ancient ruins, the party ventured into the underground caverns beneath the Whispering Woods. There they discovered a forgotten temple and encountered a mysterious shadow creature guarding an ancient artifact.
highlights: Solved the puzzle of the three elemental stones
Defeated the shadow guardian in an intense battle
Discovered the Amulet of Moon's Whisper
Found a map leading to the Skyward Mountains

adventureLog.title: Secrets of the Shrine
adventureLog.summary: The party returned to the ancient shrine ruins to investigate further. They deciphered ancient inscriptions that revealed the location of a hidden entrance to underground caverns. Along the way, they helped a lost spirit find peace.
highlights: Deciphered the ancient runes using the Map Fragment
Helped the spirit of a lost child return home
Uncovered the entrance to the underground caverns
Merchant Yumi provided supplies at a discount
itemsAcquired: Spirit Charm (gift from the child's spirit)

adventureLog.title: The Journey Begins
adventureLog.summary: Our heroes met in the village of Windwhisper and accepted a quest to investigate strange occurrences in the nearby forest. Elder Kaito spoke of shadows that moved against the wind and strange sounds echoing from ancient ruins. The party ventured into the Whispering Woods and discovered the entrance to forgotten ruins, fighting off shadow wolves along the way.
highlights: Met the mysterious Elder Kaito who spoke in riddles about 'the thin places'
Discovered ancient ruins hidden deep in the Whispering Woods
Fought off a pack of shadow wolves that seemed unnatural
Found a strange map fragment with symbols matching those in the ruins
npcsEncountered: Elder Kaito - Village elder and keeper of old stories
Guard Captain Hiro - Gruff but helpful town guard
locationsVisited: Windwhisper Village - A small trading post at the forest's edge
The Whispering Woods - Ancient forest with an eerie atmosphere
Ancient Shrine Ruins - Moss-covered stones with strange markings
itemsAcquired: Silver Bell (found in the ruins, rings with a pure tone)
Healing Potion x3 (gift from Merchant Yumi)
Shadow Wolf Pelt (might be valuable to the right person)
